name: Esprezzo
intro: No-code blockchain automation and data platform
introduce: Esprezzo is a no-code blockchain automation and data platform aims to empower everyone to access and use blockchain data, whether to facilitate crypto trading, track NFTs, get DeFi intel or build next gen applications. Esprezzo helps crypto traders, NFT creators and collectors, DeFi enthusiasts and developers realize the benefits of blockchain technology without needing to know protocol-specific programming languages.
